channel.title: Plugins on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite getting updated
item.description: As part of a new year cleanup, my WordPress plugin Isotope Visual Layouts lite is getting some much needed attention.

item.title: Teaser - Visual Layouts Pro (freetile)
item.description: Development has finished on my next plugin - Visual Layouts Pro (Freetile) plugin.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro plugin for WordPress switches to Twitter Bootstrap
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro WordPress plugin is easier to use now that it's using the Twitter Bootstrap framework with great CSS options and features.

item.title: 1 minute video - Isotope Visual Layouts WordPress plugin
item.description: Just been on a bit of a testing mission this weekend - I've put together this 1 minute screen recording of my WordPress plugin Isotope Visual Layouts.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite - gets an update & a new name
item.description: WordPress is a great tool for Websites, Blogs, Ecommerce and pretty much anything else - Which is why Isotope Visual Layouts is such a great plugin.

item.title: Visual Layouts - Isotope Filtrify and custom WordPress taxonomies
item.description: Creating tag and category based filtering is easy using my new plugin Visual Layouts Filtrify .

item.title: Just Announced: Isotope Visual Layouts plugin gets Filtrify for tags and filtering
item.description: Visual Layouts Filtrify is my newest plugin for WordPress and my first plugin to extend Isotope Visual Post Layouts.

item.title: Open Letter to Users of DBC Backup (the old plugin)
item.description: So I noticed recently that Google has an index of everyone who has installed my plugin but hasn't locked down their website.

item.title: Visual Layouts plugin for WordPress featuring Freetile
item.description: Visual Layouts my latest plugin for WordPress is here - and you can download it now.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts v1.0 is coming
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts my plugin for WordPress will soon be updated to version 1.

item.title: Freetile - Visual Post Layouts just about ready
item.description: I wanted to give you a bit of a flavour of what's coming with my new Visual Post Layouts plugin for WordPress.

item.title: Isotope Visual Post Layouts for WordPress v0.33 — introduces update notifications
item.description: Isotope Visual Post Layouts for WordPress has just been updated. As the plugin is no-longer in the WordPress repo (it's not GPL compliant) - you'll need to download this plugin and install it manually.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts for WordPress plugin - v1.0 is coming
item.description: First — thanks for your ‘patience’ Isotope Visual Layouts for WordPress will soon be turning 1.

item.title: Visual Post Layouts - with colour options
item.description: Visual Post Layouts will be my next WordPress plugin. It's nearly ready and I've been working hard to allow some great control over the plugin.

item.title: NEWS: Isotope Visual Post Layouts v0.32 just a bug fix
item.description: Isotope Visual Post Layouts v0.32 was published to the plugins repository at WordPress.

item.title: Isotope + filtrify + WordPress = No Sweat
item.description: I've been busy this weekend catching up on some development work for my favourite WordPress plugin Visual Post Layouts which uses Isotope.

item.title: Isotope Visual Post Layouts for WordPress version 0.31 is out
item.description: Isotope Visual Post Layouts is my plugin for WordPress that makes it easy to add some stunning visual effects to your blog.

item.title: NEWS: Isotope Visual Post Layouts for WordPress available to download
item.description: Isotope Visual Post Layouts (http://wordpress.damien.co/isotope) makes it easy for anyone to add stunning visual effects and animation to their WordPress website.

item.title: Isotope for WordPress plugin do amazing things to your blog
item.description: Have a look at what's coming with Isotope for WordPress, my latest plugin.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - gives the confidence that your WordPress database is backed-up and securely stored on your server [press release]
item.description: DBC Backup 2 gives confidence that your WordPress database is safely stored.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - WordPress database backup - Here comes version 2.1
item.description: DBC Backup 2 for WordPress database backup has just been updated.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - sneak peak of the new version
item.description: I wanted to give you a sneak peak at DBC Backup 2 and changes which are coming in the next version.

item.title: WordPress database backup plugin launched - DBC Backup 2
item.description: Announcing DBC Backup 2, a WordPress plugin to backup your WordPress SQL database is now available from WordPress Plugins.

item.title: WordPress Isotope - Filtering by Categories
item.description: Isotope is an ‘exquisite jQuery plugin for magical layouts’ which basically means it works wonders on responsive layouts.

item.title: Using Isotope and masonry with WordPress
item.description: So I have been using Isotope for sometime on my website - I was recently asked why I had stopped using Isotope at which point I discovered that it had stopped working when I changed my theme.

item.title: Isotope + WordPress = awesome fluid layouts
item.description: I've added Isotope the awesome jQuery framework to my main website … I just wanted to share a couple of screenshots of how good things are looking.

item.title: Getting started with Isotope WordPress
item.description: If you're interested in customising WordPress then consider building a fluid grid design with a layout that automatically responds as the page is resized.
